titleStmt.title: SII 39.217: original edition by K. Karuppiah
No. 217. (A.R. No. 217 of 1916.) TIRUPPUKKUL6I, CONJEEVERAM TALUK, CHINGLEPUT DISTRICT. VIJAYARAGHAVAPERUMĀḶ TEMPLE-ON THE GŌPURA; RIGHT OF ENTRANCE. VĪRA HARIHARARĀYA, BHAHUDĀNYA (1398 A.D.)

summary.p: This inscription states that the Kaikkōḷars and other Iḍaṅgai members made some contribution for burning a lamp in the same temple.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī man·mahāmaṇḍaleśvaran· harirāya vibhāṭan· bhāṣaikku
puva rāyā kaṇṭan· camuttiṟātipati śrī viraharihararāyaṉukkuc cel
lāniṉṟa bahutānya saṁvaṟsaratta ṛṣabhanāyaṟṟup pūrvapakṣattu nā
yaṟṟuk kiḻamaiyum tiṟitikaiyum peṟṟa puṇarpūcattu nāḷ jayaṅko
ṇṭa coḻamaṇṭalattu tāmaṟkoṭṭattut tiruppati tirup
puṭkuḻi nāyaṉāṟku tiruviḷakkukku Oṉṟu pātiyum Ivvūr
tirukkaik koḷaṟkum kaikkoḷaṟkum Emperumāṉ Aṭi
yāṟkum maṟṟum Iṭaṅkaiyil Uḷḷāṟkum Oṉṟu pātiyum
Āka Iṭaṅkaivari Iṭaṅkaiyaiy nokkivarum palavari māniyam
Āka viṭṭa Aḷavukkum caṅketa camaiyattāṟar pukutakkaṭavatalla
Eṉṟu collak kallilum cempilum veṭṭik kuṭuttom
Inta tarmattukku virotam paṇṇiṉavaṉ keṅkai karaiyil
kurāl pacuvaik koṉṟa pāpamuṅ koṇṭa nā paṭutturokam Āka
kkaṭavatu Intataṟmam caṉtiṟātittavaraiyum naṭakkakkaṭavatu Ippaṭi
kku Ivai Ivai Iṭaṅkai kāmaveḷāneṉ Eḻuttuteṟku Āka ticai Iṉṉāṉku Ellaikku Uṭpaṭṭa
naṉcey 6 li Innilam Aṟuveliyum Ivvūr nattamum cettalait tiṭallum mēl nokkiṉa mara
mum kīḻnokkiṉa kiṇaṟum Uṭpaṭṭatu Ivarkku Iṟṟaināḷ viṟṟukkuṭuttuk koḷvatāṉa Emmili
cainta vilaipporuḷ ṭu naṟkāciṉāl Ākravāram 9 10 Ippaṇam toṇṇūṟṟukkum Ivvūr
nāṉku Ellaikku Uṭpaṭṭa naṉcey Aṟuveliyum nattamum cettalait tiṭarum kuḷamum vilai Āvatākavum
Ippaṇam toṇṇūṟum Ikkiḻppaṭa paṟṟik koṇṭu Intaṅ karuppūr viṟṟu vilaip piṟamāṇam pa
ṇṇik kuṭutteṉ Uṭaiyār tiruvampalamuṭaiyār toṇṭaimāṉāṟkku kaḷañcalūr kiḻavaṉ ⌈
cellappiḷḷaiyāṉa koṉāreṉ Ippaṭikku Ivai cempiyaṉ teṟaṉār Eḻuttu
viśvesvara tevan puṅkaṉūr kiḻavaṉ Eḻuttu
Ivai tiruvīraṭṭāṉa muṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu puṅkaṉūr kiḻavaṉ Umaiyuruva
Eḻuttu Ivai perumaṅkala muṭaiyān tirumeṉi Aḻakiyāṉ Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai Ākkāṭu kiḻāṉ cellappiḷḷaiyānen
Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ ṭunan
Digital edition of SII 39.217 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
